head.title: The Mess in Iraq: Which Way Out?

hedline.hl1: The Mess in Iraq: Which Way Out?

block.p: The main problem with Niall Ferguson's argument is that Iraq should not be our first priority, cannot be a top American priority well into the future -- indeed, should never have been a priority at all. Reducing the two gravest threats to the planet -- nuclear proliferation and global warming -- were and are the correct policy and moral imperatives of the world's only superpower.
